mapper.update: MERGE INTO TB_IFIN_LIF_ALNC_FEE_CNTR_IZ T1 /* 라이프제휴수수료계약내역 */ USING ( SELECT #{baseYm} AS BASE_YM /* 기준년월 */ , #{etCnfmDvCd} AS ET_CNFM_DV_CD /* 예상확정구분코드 */ , #{lifCntrNo} AS LIF_CNTR_NO /* 라이프계약번호 */ , #{lifCntrOcTn} AS LIF_CNTR_OC_TN /* 라이프계약발생회차 */ , #{lifCntrStatCd} AS LIF_CNTR_STAT_CD /* 라이프계약상태코드 */ , #{sellDvCd} AS SELL_DV_CD /* 판매구분코드 */ , #{prtnrNo} AS PRTNR_NO /* 파트너번호 */ , #{brmgrPrtnrNo} AS BRMGR_PRTNR_NO /* 지점장파트너번호 */ , #{lifPdCd} AS LIF_PD_CD /* 라이프상품코드 */ , #{lifPdNm} AS LIF_PD_NM /* 라이프상품명 */ , #{rcpdt} AS RCPDT /* 접수일자 */ , #{cntrDt} AS CNTR_DT /* 계약일자 */ , #{canDt} AS CAN_DT /* 취소일자 */ , #{totDsbOjDvCd} AS TOT_DSB_OJ_DV_CD /* 총지급대상구분코드 */ , #{slOcAcuAmt} AS SL_OC_ACU_AMT /* 매출발생누적금액 */ , #{dpAcuAmt} AS DP_ACU_AMT /* 입금누적금액 */ , #{flpymTn} AS FLPYM_TN /* 완납회차 */ , #{cntrNo} AS CNTR_NO /* 계약번호 */ , #{cntrSn} AS CNTR_SN /* 계약일련번호 */ , #{feeDsbYm} AS FEE_DSB_YM /* 수수료지급년월 */ , #{feeRedfYm} AS FEE_REDF_YM /* 수수료되물림년월 */ , NVL(#{cnfmYn} , 'N') AS CNFM_YN /* 확정여부 */ , NVL(#{dtaDlYn} , 'N') AS DTA_DL_YN /* 데이터삭제여부 */ , NVL(#{akwday}, TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS')) AS FST_RGST_DTM , NVL(#{akwdsp}, 'EAI_WCOI1001' ) AS FST_RGST_USR_ID , NVL(#{akwpgm}, 'EAI_WCOI1001' ) AS FST_RGST_PRG_ID , NVL(#{itm07} , 'NONE' ) AS FST_RGST_DEPT_ID , NVL(#{akuday}, TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS')) AS FNL_MDFC_DTM , NVL(#{akudsp}, 'EAI_WCOI1001') AS FNL_MDFC_USR_ID , NVL(#{akupgm}, 'EAI_WCOI1001') AS FNL_MDFC_PRG_ID , NVL(#{itm08} , 'NONE') AS FNL_MDFC_DEPT_ID FROM DUAL ) T2 ON ( T1.BASE_YM = T2.BASE_YM /* 기준년월 */ AND T1.ET_CNFM_DV_CD = T2.ET_CNFM_DV_CD /* 예상확정구분코드 */ AND T1.LIF_CNTR_NO = T2.LIF_CNTR_NO /* 라이프계약번호 */ AND T1.LIF_CNTR_OC_TN = T2.LIF_CNTR_OC_TN /* 라이프계약발생회차 */ ) WHEN MATCHED THEN UPDATE SET LIF_CNTR_STAT_CD = T2.LIF_CNTR_STAT_CD , SELL_DV_CD = T2.SELL_DV_CD , PRTNR_NO = T2.PRTNR_NO , BRMGR_PRTNR_NO = T2.BRMGR_PRTNR_NO , LIF_PD_CD = T2.LIF_PD_CD , LIF_PD_NM = T2.LIF_PD_NM , RCPDT = T2.RCPDT , CNTR_DT = T2.CNTR_DT , CAN_DT = T2.CAN_DT , TOT_DSB_OJ_DV_CD = T2.TOT_DSB_OJ_DV_CD , SL_OC_ACU_AMT = T2.SL_OC_ACU_AMT , DP_ACU_AMT = T2.DP_ACU_AMT , FLPYM_TN = T2.FLPYM_TN , CNTR_NO = T2.CNTR_NO , CNTR_SN = T2.CNTR_SN , FEE_DSB_YM = T2.FEE_DSB_YM , FEE_REDF_YM = T2.FEE_REDF_YM , CNFM_YN = T2.CNFM_YN , DTA_DL_YN = T2.DTA_DL_YN , FNL_MDFC_DTM = T2.FNL_MDFC_DTM , FNL_MDFC_USR_ID = T2.FNL_MDFC_USR_ID , FNL_MDFC_PRG_ID = T2.FNL_MDFC_PRG_ID , FNL_MDFC_DEPT_ID = T2.FNL_MDFC_DEPT_ID WHEN NOT MATCHED THEN INSERT ( BASE_YM , ET_CNFM_DV_CD , LIF_CNTR_NO , LIF_CNTR_OC_TN , LIF_CNTR_STAT_CD , SELL_DV_CD , PRTNR_NO , BRMGR_PRTNR_NO , LIF_PD_CD , LIF_PD_NM , RCPDT , CNTR_DT , CAN_DT , TOT_DSB_OJ_DV_CD , SL_OC_ACU_AMT , DP_ACU_AMT , FLPYM_TN , CNTR_NO , CNTR_SN , FEE_DSB_YM , FEE_REDF_YM , CNFM_YN , DTA_DL_YN , FST_RGST_DTM , FST_RGST_USR_ID , FST_RGST_PRG_ID , FST_RGST_DEPT_ID , FNL_MDFC_DTM , FNL_MDFC_USR_ID , FNL_MDFC_PRG_ID , FNL_MDFC_DEPT_ID ) VALUES ( T2.BASE_YM , T2.ET_CNFM_DV_CD , T2.LIF_CNTR_NO , T2.LIF_CNTR_OC_TN , T2.LIF_CNTR_STAT_CD , T2.SELL_DV_CD , T2.PRTNR_NO , T2.BRMGR_PRTNR_NO , T2.LIF_PD_CD , T2.LIF_PD_NM , T2.RCPDT , T2.CNTR_DT , T2.CAN_DT , T2.TOT_DSB_OJ_DV_CD , T2.SL_OC_ACU_AMT , T2.DP_ACU_AMT , T2.FLPYM_TN , T2.CNTR_NO , T2.CNTR_SN , T2.FEE_DSB_YM , T2.FEE_REDF_YM , T2.CNFM_YN , T2.DTA_DL_YN , T2.FST_RGST_DTM , T2.FST_RGST_USR_ID , T2.FST_RGST_PRG_ID , T2.FST_RGST_DEPT_ID , T2.FNL_MDFC_DTM , T2.FNL_MDFC_USR_ID , T2.FNL_MDFC_PRG_ID , T2.FNL_MDFC_DEPT_ID )
